text: Esther (Hebrew: אסתר) is a 1986 Israeli Dutch Austrian British drama movie directed by first time director Amos Gitai and starring Simone Benyamini, Zare Vartanian, Mohammad Bakri, Juliano Mer-Khamis, Rim Banna, Fouad Awad. ==Other websites== * * Category:1986 drama movies Category:Israeli movies Category:Dutch drama movies Category:Austrian drama movies Category:1980s British drama movies Category:Movies based on the Bible Category:Movies about antisemitism Category:Movies set in Iran Category:Movies directed by Amos Gitai
title: Esther (1986 movie)
